According to the World Health Organization (WHO), there are 70 vaccines in development against severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2), the virus responsible for the COVID-19 outbreak, with three already in clinical trials.
1 The Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI), a foundation that receives donations to finance independent research projects to develop vaccines against emerging infectious diseases, is currently working with nine companies, all of which are having to adapt to accelerate their vaccine-development process.
